name: IRREPARABLE (DEMO AVAILABLE!)
description:
!!!UPDATED DEMO AVAILABLE NOW!!!

--------------------------------------------------------------

- INTRODUCTION -

Irreparable is retro, horror-adventure game following a mentally ill father desperately making up ways to save his already dying daughter.

It is my next 'real' solo-project using the Godot Game Engine, still in development, as a followup to my previous project, The Father: Reboot.

Follow me on Twitter to follow progress on the game!

This game requires OpenGL to run properly.

It is also recommended to turn your brightness up during gameplay. - INFORMATION -

As said in the introduction above, Irreparable is a slightly FNaF-inspired game. The reason for this comparison is because it contains 2D (pixel-art) top-down story segments, with 3D first-person gameplay.

My main idea and reasoning behind this project was to make a game, with a harrowing, crushing story about a father's desperate attempts to save his daughter from an unkown sickness.

The average playtime of the full release game is still to be deduced.

- STORY -

You play as a father who lost his wife to an unkown disease a year ago. Devastated by the loss of his wife, he went through depression. He needed therapy since the incident.

Now, a year later, the same disease has befallen his daughter that he holds incredibly dear.

This drives the father into insanity, and starts making up fake scenarios in his head as a coping mechanism, where he convinced himself that he can save his daughter by doing things that are all a fiction of his mind.
